LOS ANGELES, April 19 (Reuters) Bob Dylan's handwritten lyrics to his 1960s classic 'The Times They Are A-Changin' are going up for sale with a US$2.2 million (approx. $3.4 million) asking price in what could mark a world record for rock lyrics.
